subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dwayne Roloson’s 58 saves were the most in the N.H.L. in 18 years, and Josh Bailey scored on the Islanders’ only shot in overtime.
snippet: Dwayne Roloson’s 58 saves were the most in the N.H.L. in 18 years, and Josh Bailey scored on the Islanders’ only shot in overtime.
